text:
@realDonaldTrump Well, at least old and young racist white men can STILL go get COVID-19 in Florida, while visiting an open Massage Parlor, and stand in front of the Confederate Flag at Govenor DeSantis' house!

At least that's something!

LOL 😆 lol !

And, OUCH !

#RepublicanTrumpismFalls
